00024 AnaGlobResult::AnaGlobResult() : TObject(),

00028    fDoCalcPolarNorm(kTRUE),

00030    fAnaFillResults(), fNormJetCarbon(), fNormJetCarbon2(),
00031    fNormJetCarbonByTarget2(), fNormProfPolar(), fNormProfPolar2(),
00032    fAvrgPCProfRUnWs(), fSystUvsDPolar(), fSystJvsCPolar(), fSystProfPolar()
00033 {

00035    PolarimeterIdSetIter iPolId = gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.begin();
00036 
00037    for ( ; iPolId != gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.end(); ++iPolId)
00038    {
00039       EPolarimeterId polId  = *iPolId;
00040 
00041       ValErrPair valErrPair(1, -1);
00042       fNormJetCarbon2[polId] = valErrPair;
00043       fNormProfPolar2[polId] = valErrPair;
00044    }
00045 
00046    // ...same thing by target id
00047    TargetSetIter iTarget = gRunConfig.fTargets.begin();
00048 
00049    for ( ; iTarget != gRunConfig.fTargets.end(); ++iTarget)
00050    {
00051       TargetUId      targetUId = iTarget->fUId;
00052       EPolarimeterId polId     = targetUId.fPolId;

00057 
00058       fNormJetCarbonByTarget2[targetUId] = valErrPair;
00059       fAvrgPCProfRUnWs[polId][tgtOrient] = valErrPair;
00060    }
00061 }

00184 void AnaGlobResult::PrintAsPhp(FILE *f) const
00185 {
00186    fprintf(f, "$rc['fMinFill']      = %d;\n", fMinFill);
00187    fprintf(f, "$rc['fMaxFill']      = %d;\n", fMaxFill);
00188    fprintf(f, "$rc['fMinTime']      = %ld;\n", fMinTime);
00189    fprintf(f, "$rc['fMaxTime']      = %ld;\n", fMaxTime);
00190    fprintf(f, "$rc['fBeamEnergies'] = %s;\n\n", SetAsPhpArray<EBeamEnergy>(fBeamEnergies).c_str());
00191 
00192    PolId2ValErrMapConstIter iNormJC2 = fNormJetCarbon2.begin();
00193 
00194    for ( ; iNormJC2 != fNormJetCarbon2.end(); ++iNormJC2)
00195    {
00196       EPolarimeterId polId = iNormJC2->first;
00197 
00198       fprintf(f, "$rc['normHJPC']['%s']['nomi'] = new pair(%10.5f, %10.5f);\n",
00199               RunConfig::AsString(polId).c_str(), iNormJC2->second.first, iNormJC2->second.second);
00200    }
00201 
00202    TargetSetIter iTarget = gRunConfig.fTargets.begin();
00203 
00204    for ( ; iTarget != gRunConfig.fTargets.end(); ++iTarget)
00205    {
00206       TargetUId  targetUId  = iTarget->fUId;
00207       ValErrPair valErrPair = fNormJetCarbonByTarget2.find(targetUId)->second;
00208 
00209       if (valErrPair.second < 0) continue;
00210 
00211       fprintf(f, "$rc['normHJPC']['%s']['%s'][%d] = new pair(%10.5f, %10.5f);\n",
00212               RunConfig::AsString(targetUId.fPolId).c_str(), RunConfig::AsString(targetUId.fTargetOrient).c_str(),
00213               targetUId.fTargetId, valErrPair.first, valErrPair.second);
00214    }
00215 
00216    fprintf(f, "\n");
00217 }

00225 
00227 void AnaGlobResult::AddMeasResult(EventConfig &mm, DrawObjContainer *ocIn)
00228 {
00229    UInt_t fillId = mm.fMeasInfo->GetFillId();
00230 
00231    UpdMinMaxFill(fillId);
00232    UpdMinMaxTime(mm.fMeasInfo->fStartTime);
00233 
00234    // Save the energies of all measurements
00235    BeamEnergySetIter iBEnergy = fBeamEnergies.find(mm.fMeasInfo->GetBeamEnergy());
00236 
00237    if (iBEnergy == fBeamEnergies.end()) {
00238       fBeamEnergies.insert(mm.fMeasInfo->GetBeamEnergy());
00239    }
00240 
00241    // Now consider individual fills
00242    AnaFillResult *anaFillResult = GetAnaFillResult(fillId);
00243 
00244    anaFillResult->AddMeasResult(mm);
00245 
00246    // Do something about the read draw obj container
00247    if (ocIn) {
00248       //oc->Print();
00249       anaFillResult->AddGraphMeasResult(mm, *ocIn);
00250    }
00251 }

00255 void AnaGlobResult::AddHJMeasResult()
00256 {
00257    std::stringstream fullPath("");
00258    fullPath << fPathExternResults << "/hjet_pol";
00259    ifstream file(fullPath.str().c_str());
00260 
00261    Info("AddHJMeasResult", "Adding HJet polarization from file: %s", fullPath.str().c_str());
00262 
00263    if (file.good()) {
00264       UInt_t   fillId;
00265       Double_t bluPolar, bluPolarErr, bluAsym, bluAsymErr;
00266       Double_t yelPolar, yelPolarErr, yelAsym, yelAsymErr;
00267       Double_t energy;
00268       Int_t    iline = 0;
00269       string   dummy;
00270 
00271       // loop over the entries
00272       while ( file.good() )
00273       {
00274          iline++;
00275 
00276          file >> fillId >> yelAsym  >> dummy >> yelAsymErr
00277                         >> yelPolar >> dummy >> yelPolarErr
00278                         >> bluAsym  >> dummy >> bluAsymErr
00279                         >> bluPolar >> dummy >> bluPolarErr
00280                         >> energy;
00281 
00282          if (file.eof()) break;
00283 
00284          if (fillId < fMinFill || fillId > fMaxFill) continue;
00285 
00286          cout << iline << " " << fillId   << " " << fMinFill << " " << fMaxFill
00287                        << " " << yelAsym  << " " << yelAsymErr
00288                        << " " << yelPolar << " " << yelPolarErr
00289                        << " " << bluAsym  << " " << bluAsymErr
00290                        << " " << bluPolar << " " << bluPolarErr
00291                        << " " << energy   << endl;
00292 
00293          AnaFillResult *anaFillResult = GetAnaFillResult(fillId);
00294 
00295          if (bluPolarErr >= 0) {
00296             ValErrPair hjPolar_BLU(bluPolar, bluPolarErr);
00297             anaFillResult->SetHJPolar(kBLUE_RING, hjPolar_BLU);
00298          }
00299 
00300          if (bluAsymErr >= 0) {
00301             ValErrPair hjAsym_BLU(bluAsym, bluAsymErr);
00302             anaFillResult->SetHJAsym(kBLUE_RING, hjAsym_BLU);
00303          }
00304 
00305          if (yelPolarErr >= 0) {
00306             ValErrPair hjPolar_YEL(yelPolar, yelPolarErr);
00307             anaFillResult->SetHJPolar(kYELLOW_RING, hjPolar_YEL);
00308          }
00309 
00310          if (yelAsymErr >= 0) {
00311             ValErrPair hjAsym_YEL(yelAsym, yelAsymErr);
00312             anaFillResult->SetHJAsym(kYELLOW_RING, hjAsym_YEL);
00313          }
00314       }
00315    } else {
00316       Error("AddHJMeasResult", "Invalid file with hjet pol");
00317    }
00318 
00319    file.close();
00320 }

00322 
00324 void AnaGlobResult::Process(DrawObjContainer *ocOut)
00325 {
00326    Info("Process", "Processing fills...");
00327 
00328    AnaFillResultMapIter iFill = fAnaFillResults.begin();
00329 
00330    for ( ; iFill != fAnaFillResults.end(); ++iFill)
00331    {
00332       UInt_t         fillId  = iFill->first;
00333       AnaFillResult &anaFillResult = iFill->second;
00334 
00335       // First read the extern info if available...
00336       // Check whether a file with external info exists. Create corresponding
00337       // object if yes
00338       std::stringstream fullPath("");
00339       fullPath << fPathExternResults << "/cdev_info/cdev_" << fillId;
00340       ifstream file(fullPath.str().c_str());
00341       anaFillResult.AddExternInfo(file);
00342 
00343       // anaFillResult.fStartTime is properly determined at this stage
00344       // ... then do the rest
00345 
00346       // Process each fill
00347       anaFillResult.Process(ocOut);
00348    }
00349 
00350    //CalcMissingSlopes();
00351 
00352    if (fDoCalcPolarNorm) CalcPolarNorm();
00353 
00354    CalcAvrgPolProfR();
00355    CalcDependencies();
00356 }

00360 ValErrPair AnaGlobResult::GetBeamPolar(ERingId ringId, UInt_t fillId, Bool_t norm)
00361 {
00362    ValErrPair result(0, -1);
00363 
00364    AnaFillResultMapIter iFill = fAnaFillResults.find(fillId);
00365 
00366    if ( iFill == fAnaFillResults.end() ) return result;
00367 
00368    AnaFillResult *fillRslt = &iFill->second;
00369 
00370    return fillRslt->GetBeamPolar(ringId);
00371 }

00373 
00375 AnaFillResult* AnaGlobResult::GetAnaFillResult(UInt_t fillId)
00376 {
00377    AnaFillResultMapIter iFillRes = fAnaFillResults.find(fillId);
00378 
00379    if ( iFillRes == fAnaFillResults.end() ) {
00380 
00381       AnaFillResult *anaFillResult = new AnaFillResult(fillId);
00382       anaFillResult->SetAnaGlobResult(this);
00383       fAnaFillResults[fillId] = *anaFillResult;
00384       delete anaFillResult;
00385 
00386       return &fAnaFillResults[fillId];
00387 
00388    // otherwise, get a pointer to the existing one
00389    } else {
00390       // add AnaRunResult to existing AnaFillResult
00391       return &iFillRes->second;
00392    }
00393 }

00404 void AnaGlobResult::UpdMinMaxFill(UInt_t fillId)
00405 {
00406    if (fillId < fMinFill ) fMinFill = fillId;
00407    if (fillId > fMaxFill ) fMaxFill = fillId;
00408 }

00410 
00412 void AnaGlobResult::UpdMinMaxTime(time_t time)
00413 {
00414    if (time < fMinTime ) fMinTime = time;
00415    if (time > fMaxTime ) fMaxTime = time;
00416 }

00420 void AnaGlobResult::AdjustMinMaxFill()
00421 {
00422    fMinFill -= 0.5;
00423    fMaxFill += 0.5;
00424 }

00426 
00428 void AnaGlobResult::CalcPolarNorm()
00429 {
00430    Info("CalcPolarNorm()", "Called");
00431 
00432    // Create containers for polarization where both hjet and pcarbon results exist
00433    PolId2ValErrSet polarCrbSet;
00434    PolId2ValErrSet polarJetSet;
00435 
00436    // Containers for polar vs prof polar normalization
00437    PolId2ValErrSet polarCrbAllSet;
00438    PolId2ValErrSet polarCrbProfAllSet;
00439 
00440 
00441    AnaFillResultMapIter iFill = fAnaFillResults.begin();
00442 
00443    for ( ; iFill != fAnaFillResults.end(); ++iFill)
00444    {
00445       UInt_t         fillId   =  iFill->first;
00446       AnaFillResult *fillRslt = &iFill->second;
00447 
00448       PolId2ValErrMapConstIter iPolar     = fillRslt->fPCPolars.begin();
00449       PolId2ValErrMapConstIter iProfPolar = fillRslt->fPCProfPolars.begin();
00450 
00451       for ( ; iPolar != fillRslt->fPCPolars.end(); ++iPolar, ++iProfPolar)
00452       {
00453          EPolarimeterId polId       = iPolar->first;
00454          ValErrPair     polarPC     = iPolar->second;
00455          ValErrPair     polarPCProf = iProfPolar->second;
00456          ERingId        ringId      = RunConfig::GetRingId(polId);
00457          string         sPolId      = RunConfig::AsString(polId);
00458 
00459          // Polarization profile scale factor
00460          if (polarPC.second >= 0 && polarPCProf.second >= 0) {
00461             polarCrbAllSet    [polId].insert(polarPC);
00462             polarCrbProfAllSet[polId].insert(polarPCProf);
00463 
00464             fNormProfPolar2[polId] = utils::CalcWeightedAvrgErr(fNormProfPolar2[polId], utils::CalcDivision(polarPCProf, polarPC, 1));
00465          }
00466 
00467          ValErrPair polarHJ = fillRslt->GetHJPolar(ringId);
00468 
00469          // For HJet normalization: Skip if there is no corresponding hjet result for this fill
00470          if (polarPC.second < 0 || polarHJ.second < 0) {
00471             Warning("CalcPolarNorm", "Fill %d, %s: p-Carbon or H-jet polarization not available", fillId, sPolId.c_str());
00472             continue;
00473          }
00474 
00475          TargetUId targetUId = fillRslt->GetPCTarget(polId);
00476 
00477          // The fills in which the carbon target is not well defined (multiple
00478          // targets used in a fill) are not used in the normalization
00479          // The idea behind this is to be consistent with scale factors by target
00480          if (!targetUId.IsValid()) continue;
00481 
00482          polarCrbSet[polId].insert(polarPC);
00483          polarJetSet[polId].insert(polarHJ);
00484 
00485          ValErrPair norm = utils::CalcDivision(polarHJ, polarPC);
00486          fNormJetCarbon2[polId] = utils::CalcWeightedAvrgErr(fNormJetCarbon2[polId], norm);
00487 
00488          // for debugging
00489          //cout << "jjjj " << fillId << " ";
00490          //cout << ": " << PairAsPhpArray(norm) << "      " << PairAsPhpArray(fNormJetCarbon2[polId]) << endl;
00491          //printf("%d: %s: %16.7f +/- %16.7f   %16.7f +/- %16.7f\n",
00492          //   fillId, sPolId.c_str(), polarPC.first, polarPC.second, polarHJ.first, polarHJ.second);
00493 
00494          fNormJetCarbonByTarget2[targetUId] = utils::CalcWeightedAvrgErr(fNormJetCarbonByTarget2[targetUId], norm);
00495 
00496          // for debugging
00497          //cout << "kkkk " << fillId << " ";
00498          //targetUId.Print();
00499          //cout << ": " << PairAsPhpArray(norm) << "      " << PairAsPhpArray(fNormJetCarbonByTarget2[targetUId]) << endl;
00500       }
00501    }
00502 
00503    // Now calculate the weighted average for each polarimeter
00504    PolarimeterIdSetIter iPolId = gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.begin();
00505 
00506    for ( ; iPolId != gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.end(); ++iPolId)
00507    {
00508       //Info("CalcPolarNorm", "Consider polarimeter %s", RunConfig::AsString(*iPolId).c_str() );
00509 
00510       if ( polarCrbSet.find(*iPolId) != polarCrbSet.end() ) {
00511          ValErrPair avrgCrb = utils::CalcWeightedAvrgErr(polarCrbSet[*iPolId]);
00512          ValErrPair avrgJet = utils::CalcWeightedAvrgErr(polarJetSet[*iPolId]);
00513 
00514          fNormJetCarbon[*iPolId] = utils::CalcDivision(avrgJet, avrgCrb);
00515       }
00516 
00517       if ( polarCrbAllSet.find(*iPolId) != polarCrbAllSet.end() ) {
00518          ValErrPair avrgPolar     = utils::CalcWeightedAvrgErr(polarCrbAllSet[*iPolId]);
00519          ValErrPair avrgProfPolar = utils::CalcWeightedAvrgErr(polarCrbProfAllSet[*iPolId]);
00520 
00521          fNormProfPolar[*iPolId]  = utils::CalcDivision(avrgProfPolar, avrgPolar);
00522       }
00523    }
00524 }
00525 
00526 
00528 void AnaGlobResult::CalcAvrgPolProfR()
00529 {
00530    Info("CalcAvrgPolProfR()", "Called");
00531 
00532    AnaFillResultMapIter iFill = fAnaFillResults.begin();
00533    for ( ; iFill != fAnaFillResults.end(); ++iFill)
00534    {
00535       //UInt_t         fillId   =  iFill->first;
00536       AnaFillResult *fillRslt = &iFill->second;
00537 
00538       PolarimeterIdSetIter iPolId = gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.begin();
00539       for ( ; iPolId != gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.end(); ++iPolId)
00540       {
00541          EPolarimeterId polId  = *iPolId;
00542 
00543          TargetOrientSetIter iTgtOrient = gRunConfig.fTargetOrients.begin();
00544 
00545          for ( ; iTgtOrient != gRunConfig.fTargetOrients.end(); ++iTgtOrient)
00546          {
00547             ETargetOrient tgtOrient   = *iTgtOrient;
00548             ValErrPair    fillPCProfR = fillRslt->GetPCProfR(polId, tgtOrient);
00549             ValErrPair    currAvrg    = GetAvrgPCProfRUnW(polId, tgtOrient);
00550 
00551             fAvrgPCProfRUnWs[polId][tgtOrient] = utils::CalcWeightedAvrgErr(currAvrg, fillPCProfR);
00552          }
00553       }
00554 
00555       //if (polarCrb.second < 0 || polarJet.second < 0) continue; // skip if not a valid result
00556 
00557       // for debugging
00558       //string sPolId = RunConfig::AsString(polId);
00559       //printf("%d: %s: %16.7f +/- %16.7f   %16.7f +/- %16.7f\n",
00560       //   fillId, sPolId.c_str(), polarCrb.first, polarCrb.second, polarJet.first, polarJet.second);
00561    }
00562 }
00563 
00564 
00566 void AnaGlobResult::CalcDependencies()
00567 {
00568    Info("CalcDependencies()", "Called");
00569 
00570    // Create sets with valid syst ratio
00571    RingId2ValErrSet ratioU2DSet;
00572    PolId2ValErrSet  ratioHJ2PCSet;
00573    PolId2ValErrSet  ratioP2PPSet;
00574 
00575    AnaFillResultMapIter iFill = fAnaFillResults.begin();
00576 
00577    for ( ; iFill != fAnaFillResults.end(); ++iFill)
00578    {
00579       AnaFillResult *fillRslt = &iFill->second;
00580 
00581       // Using calculated normalization and pol. profiles calculate average beam
00582       // polarization and the same in collisions
00583       fillRslt->CalcBeamPolar(kTRUE);
00584 
00585       RingId2ValErrMap ratioU2D   = fillRslt->CalcPolarRatioU2D(fNormJetCarbon2);
00586       PolId2ValErrMap  ratioHJ2PC = fillRslt->CalcSystJvsCPolar(fNormJetCarbon2);
00587       PolId2ValErrMap  ratioP2PP  = fillRslt->CalcSystProfPolar(fNormProfPolar2);
00588 
00589       //
00590       PolarimeterIdSetConstIter iPolId = gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.begin();
00591 
00592       for ( ; iPolId != gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.end(); ++iPolId)
00593       {
00594          EPolarimeterId polId  = *iPolId;
00595          ERingId        ringId = RunConfig::GetRingId(polId);
00596 
00597          if (polId == kB1U && ratioU2D[ringId].second >= 0) ratioU2DSet[ringId].insert(ratioU2D[ringId]);
00598          if (polId == kY2U && ratioU2D[ringId].second >= 0) ratioU2DSet[ringId].insert(ratioU2D[ringId]);
00599 
00600          if (ratioHJ2PC[polId].second >= 0) ratioHJ2PCSet[polId].insert(ratioHJ2PC[polId]);
00601          if (ratioP2PP[polId].second  >= 0) ratioP2PPSet[polId].insert(ratioP2PP[polId]);
00602       }
00603    }
00604 
00605    // Calculate the contribution from the systematic effects
00606    utils::SystRatioFitFunctor srff;
00607 
00608    PolarimeterIdSetConstIter iPolId = gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.begin();
00609    for ( ; iPolId != gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.end(); ++iPolId)
00610    {
00611       EPolarimeterId polId  = *iPolId;
00612       ERingId        ringId = RunConfig::GetRingId(polId);
00613 
00614       // Syst contribution for U vs D
00615       if (polId == kB1U || polId == kY2U) {
00616          srff.SetSet(ratioU2DSet[ringId]);
00617          TF1 systRatioFitFunc("systRatioFitFunc", srff, -10, 10, 0, "SystRatioFitFunctor");
00618          ROOT::Math::WrappedTF1 wf1(systRatioFitFunc);
00619          ROOT::Math::BrentRootFinder brf;
00620          brf.SetFunction(wf1, 0, 1);
00621          brf.Solve();
00622          fSystUvsDPolar[ringId].first = brf.Root();
00623       }
00624 
00625       // Syst contribution for H-Jet vs p-Carbon
00626       srff.SetSet(ratioHJ2PCSet[polId]);
00627       TF1 systRatioFitFunc_JvsC("systRatioFitFunc_JvsC", srff, -10, 10, 0, "SystRatioFitFunctor");
00628       ROOT::Math::WrappedTF1 wf1_JvsC(systRatioFitFunc_JvsC);
00629       ROOT::Math::BrentRootFinder brf_JvsC;
00630       brf_JvsC.SetFunction(wf1_JvsC, 0, 1);
00631       brf_JvsC.Solve();
00632       fSystJvsCPolar[polId].first = brf_JvsC.Root();
00633 
00634       // Syst contribution in p-Carbon polar vs p-Carbon prof polar
00635       srff.SetSet(ratioP2PPSet[polId]);
00636       TF1 systRatioFitFunc_Prof("systRatioFitFunc_Prof", srff, -10, 10, 0, "SystRatioFitFunctor");
00637       ROOT::Math::WrappedTF1 wf1_Prof(systRatioFitFunc_Prof);
00638       ROOT::Math::BrentRootFinder brf_Prof;
00639       brf_Prof.SetFunction(wf1_Prof, 0, 1);
00640       brf_Prof.Solve();
00641       fSystProfPolar[polId].first = brf_Prof.Root();
00642    }
00643 }
00644 
00645 
00647 void AnaGlobResult::UpdateInsertDb(AsymDbSql *asymDbSql)
00648 {
00649    if (!asymDbSql) {
00650       Error("UpdateInsertDb", "Cannot connect to MySQL DB");
00651       return;
00652    }
00653 
00654    asymDbSql->OpenConnection();
00655 
00656    AnaFillResultMapConstIter iFillRes = fAnaFillResults.begin();
00657 
00658    for ( ; iFillRes != fAnaFillResults.end(); ++iFillRes)
00659    {
00660       const AnaFillResult &fillResult = iFillRes->second;
00661       UInt_t fillId = fillResult.GetFillId();
00662 
00663       cout << endl;
00664       Info("UpdateInsert", "fill %d", fillId);
00665 
00666 
00667       // test
00668       //Info("UpdateInsert", "Test Test");
00669 
00670       // Save results from the p-Carbon polarimeters
00671       PolarimeterIdSetIter iPolId = gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.begin();
00672 
00673       for ( ; iPolId != gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.end(); ++iPolId)
00674       {
00675          EPolarimeterId polId  = *iPolId;
00676          ERingId        ringId = RunConfig::GetRingId(polId);
00677 
00678          // Polarization
00679          MseFillPolarNewX* ofillP = asymDbSql->SelectFillPolar(fillId, polId, ringId);
00680          MseFillPolarNewX* nfillP = 0;
00681 
00682          if (ofillP) { // if fill found in database copy it to new one
00683             nfillP = new MseFillPolarNewX(*ofillP);
00684          } else { // if fill not found in database create it
00685             nfillP = new MseFillPolarNewX(fillId, polId, ringId);
00686          }
00687 
00688          nfillP->SetValuesPC(fillResult, polId);
00689          asymDbSql->UpdateInsert(ofillP, nfillP);
00690 
00691          //TargetUId targetUId = fillRslt->GetPCTarget(polId);
00692          //if (!targetUId.IsValid()) continue;
00693 
00694          // Profile
00695          TargetOrientSetIter iTgtOrient = gRunConfig.fTargetOrients.begin();
00696 
00697          for ( ; iTgtOrient != gRunConfig.fTargetOrients.end(); ++iTgtOrient)
00698          {
00699             ETargetOrient tgtOrient = *iTgtOrient;
00700 
00701             // Skip measurements whit invalid profile values
00702             ValErrPair fillPCProfR = fillResult.GetPCProfR(polId, tgtOrient);
00703             if (fillPCProfR.second < 0) {
00704                Info("UpdateInsert", "Skip invalid profile measurement in polId %d, tgtOrient %d", polId, tgtOrient);
00705                continue;
00706             }
00707 
00708 
00709             MseFillProfileNewX* ofillProf = asymDbSql->SelectFillProfile(fillId, polId, tgtOrient);
00710             MseFillProfileNewX* nfillProf = 0;
00711 
00712             if (ofillProf) { // if fill found in database copy it to new one
00713                nfillProf = new MseFillProfileNewX(*ofillProf);
00714             } else { // if fill not found in database create it
00715                nfillProf = new MseFillProfileNewX(fillId, polId, tgtOrient);
00716             }
00717 
00718             nfillProf->SetValues(fillResult, polId, tgtOrient);
00719             asymDbSql->UpdateInsert(ofillProf, nfillProf);
00720          }
00721       }
00722 
00723       // Save results from the H-jet polarimeter
00724       RingIdSetIter iRingId = gRunConfig.fRings.begin();
00725 
00726       for ( ; iRingId != gRunConfig.fRings.end(); ++iRingId)
00727       {
00728          EPolarimeterId polId = kHJET;
00729          ERingId ringId = *iRingId;
00730 
00731          MseFillPolarNewX* ofillP = asymDbSql->SelectFillPolar(fillId, polId, ringId);
00732          MseFillPolarNewX* nfillP = 0;
00733 
00734          if (ofillP) { // if fill found in database copy it to new one
00735             nfillP = new MseFillPolarNewX(*ofillP);
00736          } else { // if fill not found in database create it
00737             nfillP = new MseFillPolarNewX(fillId, polId, ringId);
00738          }
00739 
00740          nfillP->SetValuesHJ(fillResult, ringId);
00741          asymDbSql->UpdateInsert(ofillP, nfillP);
00742       }
00743       // test end
00744       // test end
00745       // test end
00746       // test end
00747 
00748 
00749       /*
00750       MseFillPolarX *ofill = asymDbSql->SelectFillPolar(fillId);
00751       MseFillPolarX *nfill = 0;
00752 
00753       if (ofill) { // if fill found in database copy it to new one
00754          nfill = new MseFillPolarX(*ofill);
00755       } else { // if fill not found in database create it
00756          nfill = new MseFillPolarX(fillId);
00757       }

00767       MseFillProfileX *nfillProf = 0;
00768

00770          nfillProf = new MseFillProfileX(*ofillProf);
00771       } else { // if fill not found in database create it
00772          nfillProf = new MseFillProfileX(fillId);
00773       }
00774

00776       //nfillProf->Print();
00777 
00778       asymDbSql->UpdateInsert(ofillProf, nfillProf);
00779       */
00780    }
00781 
00782    asymDbSql->CloseConnection();
00783 }
00784 
00785 
00787 ValErrPair AnaGlobResult::GetNormJetCarbon(EPolarimeterId polId)
00788 {
00789    ValErrPair norm(1, -1); // default values
00790 
00791    if ( fNormJetCarbon2.find(polId) != fNormJetCarbon2.end() )
00792       norm = fNormJetCarbon2[polId];
00793 
00794    return norm;
00795 }
00796 
00797 
00799 ValErrPair AnaGlobResult::GetNormProfPolar(EPolarimeterId polId)
00800 {
00801    ValErrPair norm(1, -1); // default values
00802 
00803    if ( fNormProfPolar2.find(polId) != fNormProfPolar2.end() )
00804       norm = fNormProfPolar2[polId];
00805 
00806    return norm;
00807 }
